message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this product. Given its value, I believe a starting price of $1,100,000 is fair. What do you think?

Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value you place on the product. However, given my budget constraints, I am only able to consider offers up to $950,000. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.
Bob, I understand your budget constraints, but $950,000 is significantly below its true worth.  I could be willing to meet you halfway. How about $1,025,000?
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. However, I still cannot justify spending more than $950,000 on this product. Could we possibly find a middle ground?
